Question: In the game, this person completed 19 of 26 passes for 253 yards, 2 touchdowns, and no interceptions.
Hints: After a May 23 neck surgery, this person could not use the Colts' facilities for practice and workouts due to the NFL lockout.
The Vols ended the season ranked third and this person came in sixth in Heisman Trophy voting.
This person and Addai helped the Colts to a 13–7 half-time lead, and an early fourth quarter touchdown upped the lead to 20–10.
